title: Digital-Based Learning Effectiveness and Enjoyment Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Customized education for teenagers in their teens composed of entry-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-directed learning plans with over 80% accuracy using computer-based learning tools.
Participants can improve professional problem-solving skills (social studies domain) by 70% through digital simulation activities.
Learners can revise and improve learning strategies at least three times based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
